actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act to incorporate construction and operation measures for the benefit of fish and wildlife resources in works of improvement authorized under that act.

summary.text: Incorporates construction and operation measures for the benefit of fish and wildlife resources in works of improvement authorized under the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1008)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act to incorporate construction and operation measures for the benefit of fish and wildlife resources in works of improvement authorized under that act.
